Text: Special for Holiday Gift Offer from FORBES Give two Forbes gifts for the price of one Just click on the link below or copy and paste it into your internet browser cgibinmaildllH Dear FORBES Reader Wrap up your holiday gift shopping right now Its fast and easy and youll save valuable time and money Click on the URL to order now cgibinmaildllH Give two Forbes gift subscriptions for the price of one Its like getting the second gift FREE Special holiday offer includes a mailed gift card or ecard Pay nothing now Your generosity will be appreciated throughout the year each time a new issue of Forbes arrives Just click the link below to tell us which two of your colleagues friends or family members you want to send FORBES to in and well do the rest Of course you can use one of the gifts for yourself Click on the URL below for quick and easy gift giving cgibinmaildllH My very best wishes for a happy holiday and a prosperous New Year Sincerely Steve Forbes You are receiving this special gift email offer because you gave us permission to send you email about your subscription and special offers from Forbes If you would rather not receive future offers from us please visit online customer service by clicking on the internet address below customerservice Replies to this email regarding customer service inquiries will cause a delay in handling your customer service request
